"A.P.241/10/17": "Ah, hello! Sorry for losing my composure the other day."
"But it's still going to be called Hero. The Class has already been registered under that name, after all."
"I'm the one who gave it that name. I couldn't think of anything more fitting!"
"After all, Guardians like yourself are heroes. Everyone in ARKS is a hero! I don't want anyone to forget that."
"You see, I was born on Ship 128 \"Themis\", which was attacked by Darkers a number of years ago."

"When our Ship got attacked, I wasn't a member of ARKS--I was just a kid.
I was terrified of the Darkers that were roaming around the residential district."
"...I couldn't do anything but think to myself, \"Ah, so this is where I die.\""
"But then, out of nowhere, an ARKS member showed up and wiped out this huge wave of Darkers like it was nothing."

"I just froze there, unable to even personally thank them. I stood behind them, looked
up at their imposing silhouette and simply thought to myself, \"That's a real life hero.\""
"I want to be just like them. To be able to save someone--to give someone hope, just like that person did for me..."
"I named the Class \"Hero\" precisely with those feelings in mind."
"ARKS are even more heroic than people think they are!"
"So if the name can help more people more people realize this... Well, I'd be so very grateful."
"That's why I'm gonna have to keep training suuuper SUPER hard in order to live up to the Class' name!"
"Alright! I'm feeling revitalized and fully charged! Thank you very much for having this talk with me!"
